entries.journal_entry_description: You've found some splinters of what appears to be a larger crystal. You're not sure what to do with them yet but have decided to keep them.
entries.task00_message_box_text: Inside the old box you find some small splinters of what appears to be a crystal. You scoop them up and put them in your backpack for now.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've found some splinters of a crystal in a box. Not sure what to do with them yet you're just holding on to them.
entries.task02_message_box_text: All of a sudden you feel something vibrate in your backpack and you hear a low humming sound. As you open your backpack you see that it seems to come from the crystal splinters you found in the box earlier...
entries.task04_message_box_text: You've found some more crystal splinters. As soon as you put them in your backpack with the others, the old ones stop vibrating and glowing...
